verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G846>myself,<s%> <S%G3870>entreat<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4236>humility<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1932>gentleness<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> I <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> your <S%G4383>presence<s%> <S%G3303>am<s%> <S%G5011>lowly<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> being <S%G548>absent<s%> am <S%G2292>bold<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yes,<s%> I <S%G1189>beg<s%> you that I <S%G2292>may<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> when <S%G3918>present,<s%> show <S%G2292>courage<s%> with the <S%G4006>confidence<s%> with which I <S%G3049>intend<s%> to be <S%G5111>bold<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G5100>some,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3049>consider<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to <S%G5613>be<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>
<S%G1063>For<s%> though we <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G4754>we<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> wage <S%G4754>war<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G3696>weapons<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4752>warfare<s%> are <S%G3756>not<s%> of the <S%G4559>flesh,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1415>mighty<s%> before <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the throwing <S%G2506>down<s%> of <S%G3794>strongholds,<s%>

throwing <S%G2507>down<s%> <S%G3053>imaginations<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> high <S%G5313>thing<s%> that is <S%G1869>exalted<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> bringing <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3540>thought<s%> into <S%G163>captivity<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

Do you <S%G991>look<s%> at <S%G3588>things<s%> only <S%G2596>as<s%> they appear in front of your <S%G4383>face?<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> anyone <S%G3982>trusts<s%> in <S%G1438>himself<s%> that he <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s, let <S%G3049>him<s%> <S%G3049>consider<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G575>with<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G3754>that,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> are <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1437%G99999>though<s%> I should <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> <S%G4053>abundantly<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G3739>(which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2254><s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G3619>building<s%> you <S%G2532>up,<s%> and <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> casting <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G2506>down<s%>) I <S%G153>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G153>disappointed,<s%>

<S%G3049>Let<s%> such a <S%G5108>person<s%> <S%G3049>consider<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3634>what<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> in <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1992>letters<s%> when we are <S%G548>absent,<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> are we <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G2041>deed<s%> when we are <S%G3918>present.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> we are <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5111>bold<s%> to <S%G1469>number<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4793>compare<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> with <S%G5100>some<s%> of those who <S%G4921>commend<s%> <S%G1438>themselves.<s%> <S%G235>But<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G3354>themselves,<s%> measuring <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4793>comparing<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> with <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G4920>are<s%> <S%G3756>without<s%> <S%G4920>understanding.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G5239>stretch<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> too <S%G5239>much,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> we <S%G3361>didn't<s%> <S%G2185>reach<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G5348>came<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as far <S%G891>as<s%> to <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2744>boasting<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G280>beyond<s%> proper <S%G280>limits<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> other <S%G245>men<s%>'s <S%G2873>labors,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> that as <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G837>grows,<s%> we will be <S%G4050>abundantly<s%> <S%G3170>enlarged<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> sphere of <S%G2583>influence,<s%>

so as to preach the Good <S%G2097>News<s%> even <S%G1519>to<s%> the parts <S%G5238>beyond<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2583>what<s%> <S%G245>someone<s%> else has <S%G1519>already<s%> <S%G2092>done.<s%>
